articles.author: Michael Gwilliam
articles.title: Overwatch 2 Flashpoint level designers want to remake “fan favorite” 2CP maps - Dexerto
articles.description: The Overwatch devs are interested in remaking more 2CP maps in the Flashpoint mode after redesigning India for OW2.
articles.content:
The Overwatch 2 Flashpoint designers are interested in remaking fan favorite 2CP maps after doing the same for India.
When Overwatch 2 was revealed, an unreleased 2CP map in India was shown off, but… [+2802 chars]

articles.title: France sees a slight rebound in Covid-19 with the emergence of ‘Eris’ variant - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: France has seen a slight rebound in the number of Covid-19 cases since August 1. The numbers of medical procedures and emergency room visits have risen amid the appearance of a new variant nicknamed "Eris". Although there is no cause for panic, experts say it…

articles.author: Chris Baraniuk
articles.title: Mission to the Moon: Who will win Russian and India's race to the lunar South Pole? - BBC
articles.description: Two spacecraft – one built by India and the other by Russia – are hurtling on missions towards our Moon by very different routes. But does it matter which touches down first?
articles.content: For decades, our reading of things that happen in space has been unavoidably shaped by the original space race of the 1960s, in which the United States and the Soviet Union vied to put a human being … [+2820 chars]

articles.description: A big freeze previously unknown to science drove early humans from Europe for 200,000 years, but they adapted and returned, new research shows.Ocean sediment...
